summary: This bill, the "Protecting Life in Health Savings Accounts Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the use of health savings accounts (HSAs), Archer MSAs, health flexible spending arrangements, health reimbursement arrangements, and retiree health accounts for abortions, except in cases of rape, incest, or when the woman's life is endangered. The amendments would apply to amounts paid or expenses incurred in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
